thread.title: Queeraoke at Metropolitan Bar - GO Magazine
thread.title_full: Queeraoke at Metropolitan Bar - GO Magazine

author: @GOMag
title: Queeraoke at Metropolitan Bar - GO Magazine
text:
-QUEERAOKE-
(Every Tuesday)
10:00pm – No Cover
Drink Special: $4 Well drinks
Miss Katie hosts our long-running weekly karaoke night.
We have props for you to use for when you sing, and we give out a $25 Bar Tab to the most spirited performer of the evening!
-FREE WIRELESS INTERNET
-A phone charging station for your convenience
-A POOL TABLE for you to work on your trick shots! The sign up sheet goes fast, so reserve your spot!
-A DIGITAL PHOTO BOOTH for you to commemorate the moment
Since 2002, Metropolitan had been one of Brooklyn’s original gay bars!
We welcome EVERYONE at Metropolitan! LGBTQ+ and all our allies…everyone is welcome here!
In the chilly winter months, we’ve got 2 fireplaces to keep you warm and fuzzy. Bundle up on a sofa with your friends or special someone and sip those drinks fireside!
Our huge outdoor patio/garden is one of the best in Brooklyn and open all year long!!! We challenge you to find a better backyard than ours!
***RESERVE OUR PRIVATE 2nd FLOOR OUTDOOR PATIO FOR BIRTHDAYS/OFFICE PARTIES/ETC***
Private Patio Available Hours: 3pm-11pm
CALL BAR FOR DETAILS.
Our legendary Sunday BBQ’s happen every year from Memorial Day weekend through Labor Day! FREE food, two levels of outdoor seating, rotating DJ’s, and backyard shows.
Metropolitan is located at 559 Lorimer Street
(between Metropolitan Ave & Devoe St) in Williamsburg, Brooklyn
718-599-4444
METROPOLITAN IS OPEN DAILY 365 DAYS A YEAR
3pm-4am (Major holiday hours can vary)
